title: Our school
creator_credit: Leon Clore, Graphic Films, National Union of Teachers and John Krish
brief_description: Tells the story of one day in the life of one secondary modern school, the Francis Combe School at Watford in Hertfordshire. Scenes of traditional bookwork, handicrafts, a visit to a local industry, give an impression of the kind of education which the best of these schools provide. Comments on the aims of the school, and some of the problems of the children and teachers.
